metadata.title: Beauty Concepts 2 Pack (60 Count Each) Vanilla Almond “Donut Forget to Remove your Makeup” Facial Cleansing Wipes – Detoxifies Skin and Removes Makeup – Flip Top Pack
metadata.details: {"Brand": "B.C BEAUTY CONCEPTS", "Unit Count": "2.00 Count", "Number of Items": "2", "Age Range (Description)": "Adult", "Item Form": "Wipes", "Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Package Dimensions": "7.87 x 4.53 x 4.49 inches; 2.01 Pounds", "UPC": "192598256805"}

categorization.explanation: The product is a pack of facial cleansing wipes that are used to remove makeup, hence it fits best under the 'Makeup Remover' subcategory of 'Makeup' in 'Beauty & Personal Care'.
